abstract: Rúben Filipe Marques Amorim (born 27 January 1985) is a Portuguese professional footballer who plays for S.L. Benfica mainly as a midfielder.His style is similar to countryman Tiago, with both playing the same position, operating in central midfield, both defensive and offensive (Amorim, however, is also able to play as a right back).
